About.p1: I am a Node.js, Java, and Python software developer with over 1 year of experience in web development. I am a dedicated, studious professional, always eager to learn and grow, ready to face any challenge, and contribute effective solutions for the success of the team.
About.p2: I am currently focused on backend development and work with the following technologies:
About.p3: Node.js (Javascript/Typescript) | Framework Express/Nestjs/Fastify | Java Spring Python (Pandas, Django) | SQL, relational databases (Postgres, MySql, and SQLServer) and non-relational databases (Redis, MongoDB) | Unit and integration testing with Node.js and Java | Knowledge of microservices, design patterns, DDD, and Clean Code (SOLID) | Docker Knowledge of code versioning with GIT, Github, GitLab Basic knowledge of React.js, Angular, NextJS, HTML, CSS, and JS.
About.p4: I have intermediate-level reading and conversational skills in English.

First.description: I developed integrations between Node.js applications and Oracle services using Express and NestJS, optimizing data flow and communication between systems. I implemented secure and efficient RESTful APIs, following best development practices. I used Docker for deploying and managing applications, as well as MongoDB and PostgreSQL for data storage. I created unit tests with Jest and end-to-end tests to ensure the quality of functionalities. I automated the sending of personalized emails with Python and Pandas, eliminating manual processes and increasing the efficiency of marketing campaigns. In Salesforce, I developed e-commerce functionalities with Node.js, HTML, and CSS, improving customer experience and fixing bugs to ensure project stability.

Second.description: I work in backend development using JavaScript ES6 and Java (8+), focusing on building efficient and scalable REST APIs. I have experience with the HTTP protocol, relational databases, and optimizing SQL queries. Additionally, I am proficient in Node.js and Express.js for creating robust servers and middleware. I also have knowledge in test automation with Selenium and basic understanding of AWS for cloud solutions.

First.title: Communication between Microservices.
First.description: Project for communication between Java and Node.js microservices

Second.title: Papelaria API
Second.description: E-commerce API built with NestJS, Postgres, and AWS S3
